name: Escaping Nature's Vengeance
description:
Inspired by the game LUFTRAUSERS, Escaping Nature's Vengeance (ENV) is a 2D action game about fighting an overwhelming military force as a plane, while trying to use environmental hazards to your benefit and the enemy's detriment. 

The game features 9 different parts to customise your plane with, each promoting different styles of play. With an arcade-style scoring system that rewards skilled aggressive play, ENV has plenty of replayability. 

The members of the Streaking Hostages are:

Project Manager/Programmer/Designer/Writer:

Harrison Sinnamon (applemons)

Audio Engineer/Programmer/Designer:

Nathan Poulton (Nathan3197)

Artist/Programmer/Designer:

Liam Sigrell (FrostyZ)
